We consider three machine learning tasks.
The datasets are described in Table 2.
As described in Section 3.1, we take the weight αisubscript𝛼𝑖\alpha_{i} of device i𝑖i to be proportional to the number of datapoints Nisubscript𝑁𝑖N_{i} on the device.
